column1: Funeral services will be at 1:00 p.m. Wednesday
column3: 2015) at the Dermitt Funeral Home in Leitchfield. Bro. Gary Woosley will be officiating. Burial will be in the Vol Layman Cemetery. Visitation will be at the Dermitt Funeral Home from 1:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. on Tuesday and from 9:00 a.m. Wednesday until time of services.
